work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Rebuilt the admin login system for a predictive weight management app, using Node.js, Express.js, and MySQL within an Agile workflow, resolving backend access issues and enabling admin management of 1,500+ user records.
achievements: Rebuilt the admin login system for a predictive weight management app, using Node.js, Express.js, and MySQL within an Agile workflow, resolving backend access issues and enabling admin management of 1,500+ user records

Improved backend scalability and performance by restructuring the login logic and implementing MySQL connection pooling, supporting 10x more concurrent requests and reducing request delays during peak usage

work.title: Freelance Web Developer
